events.title: Jamestown Island is chosen for a settlement

movie.title: The New World
movie.plot: A drama about explorer John Smith and the clash between Native Americans and English settlers in the 17th century.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 32 nominations.

events.title: the Capricorn One capsule "lands" on Mars

movie.title: Capricorn One
movie.plot: In order to protect the reputation of the American space program, a team of scientists stages a phony Mars landing. Willingly participating in the deception are a trio of well-meaning astronauts, who become liabilities when their space capsule is reported lost on re-entry. Now, with the help of a crusading reporter, they must battle a sinister conspiracy that will stop at nothing to keep the truth.
